verbs.description: If [ARG1: you] [V: 're] [ARG2: suddenly curious as to who becomes president in case President Donald Trump resigns , dies , or is impeached] , take a look at the 18 people in line for succession .

If you 're suddenly curious as to who becomes president in case [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: resigns] , dies , or is impeached , take a look at the 18 people in line for succession .
If you 're suddenly curious as to who becomes president in case [ARG1: President Donald Trump] resigns , [V: dies] , or is impeached , take a look at the 18 people in line for succession .
If you 're suddenly curious as to who becomes president in case President Donald Trump resigns , dies , or [V: is] impeached , take a look at the 18 people in line for succession .
If you 're suddenly curious as to who becomes president in case [ARG1: President Donald Trump] resigns , dies , or is [V: impeached] , take a look at the 18 people in line for succession .

[ARGM-ADV: If you 're suddenly curious as to who becomes president in case President Donald Trump resigns , dies , or is impeached] , [V: take] [ARG1: a look at the 18 people in line for succession] .
